title: Fred Penner books pre-Christmas show
text:
Fred Penner and The Cat’s Meow Band will play a pre-Christmas show at the Burton Cummings Threatre this December. 

The children’s entertainer will perform an afternoon show at the theatre on Dec. 19. The show will also feature guest appearances from Fred’s daughter W.Darling, a Los Angeles-based pop singer, as well as from Al Simmons. 
Tickets range from $17.50-$27.50 and go on sale to the general public on Friday morning via Ticketmaster. Sponsored Links Fred Penner books pre-Christmas show 
WINNIPEG SUN Tuesday, October 13, 2015 10:48 AM CDT | Updated: Tuesday, October 13, 2015 10:51 AM CDT
